texts.text: Official Minecraft demo releases available to try for free include:

1 Java Edition
2 Bedrock Edition
3 Other
4 External links

A Minecraft demo mode of the current game version for users who have not purchased the game yet and would like to try it out first. They can play on a world for up to 100 minutes.
The PC Gamer demo (outdated, but still available for free) - a limited version of Beta 1.3 that can be played on a world for up to 100 minutes.
Classic (outdated) - the first development version of Minecraft available in both Singleplayer and Multiplayer.

A Trial version for Bedrock Edition available on Android, Windows, and the PlayStation 4.
Pocket Edition Demo, the first Pocket Edition Alpha version, handed out to people for testing.
Minecraft 4k (created separately from Minecraft) - a very limited version of Minecraft developed for the Java 4K in less than 4 kilobytes.
